description: Detects creation of cron file or files in Cron directories which could indicates potential persistence.
author: Roberto Rodriguez (Cyb3rWard0g)
OTR (Open Threat Research)
MSTIC
name: Persistence Via Cron Files
query: ((file.path.text:(\/etc\/cron.d\/* OR \/etc\/cron.daily\/* OR \/etc\/cron.hourly\/* OR \/etc\/cron.monthly\/* OR \/etc\/cron.weekly\/* OR \/var\/spool\/cron\/crontabs\/*)) OR (file.path.text:(*\/etc\/cron.allow* OR *\/etc\/cron.deny* OR *\/etc\/crontab*)))
